subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] No audio limiter.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Ok, maybe I'l add in a switch.


>From: Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...>
>Reply-To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] No audio limiter.
>Date: Fri, 10 Aug 2007 22:02:05 -0700 (PDT)
>
>Yeah no I like the other way better for my own ears. I got alot more 
>quality from the other way. And it continued on for quite a long period in 
>parts. This way is too fragmented for my ears to make out everything, just 
>bits and peices.
>   You are right it cuts down on alot of the noise but I think they 
>manipulate the noise and static so it plays a role for my recordings using 
>radio methods. Use whatever sounds best for your ears tho if you will be 
>using it.
>   Misty
